content: a super easy crochet tote bag project perfect for beginners and pros alike this crochet bag pattern doesn t require any fancy hardware or advanced techniques but it will look professionally done the design is perfect for a market bag beach bag reusable grocery bag etc the straps are crocheted from the same yarn as the body so it s super simple you can easily customize the bag as a shoulder bag or cross body style just by making the straps longer downloadable printable pdf pattern includes the link to a full follow along video tutorial materials i used lily sugar n cream super size in color sonoma #4 medium weight yarn 6mm crochet hook scissors yarn needle skill easy notes this pattern uses english us terminology yarn needed 280 yards/2 skeins of lily sugar n cream super size gauge unblock 11 double_crochet x 5 5 row = 4 bag measurements 26 18 circumference x 13 81 tall not including the strap x 8 72 strap length *keep in mind that your bag will stretch out with use thank you for stopping by happy crocheting
